scripts.release: npm run build && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path 'dist/*' -DestinationPath 'releases/KeycapStudio-v%npm_package_version%.zip' -Force" && gh release create v%npm_package_version% releases/KeycapStudio-v%npm_package_version%.zip --title "KeycapStudio v%npm_package_version%" --notes-file releases/RELEASES.md
